item.description:
HOST: Claire P

How about an afternoon of ice skating? I will be going to Conway Skating Arena and hope that some of you will join me! Itâ€™s always so much more fun when we do things as a group.
The public skating takes place at 2:30 and last two hours. Feel free to join us anytime between 2:30 and 4:30. After the event, we will decide on a nearby venue for a hot drink, snack or light meal and great conversation with good company.
Please remember to wear layers and gloves, so that you will stay comfortable and warm. I hope to see you there! Call my cell if you need to. 603-247-0897.

Admission is $5.00, rentals are $4.00.

If you will be renting skates, I recommend that you bring extra socks, to be sure that your feet are "cushioned" comfortably into the skates.

Directions: From the Everett Turnpike, take exit 5 in the direction of Hollis. Take right on Riverside Dr. Take first left on Stadium Dr.
Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Ice Skating at Conway in Nashua
